1930 Soccer World Cup Results

All the results from the games played in the 1930 World Cup with goals scored, extratime and penalties information.

Game Date Stage Results
1. Jul 13, 1930 1st Round, Group 1 France 4 - 1 Mexico
2. Jul 13, 1930 1st Round, Group 4 USA 3 - 0 Belgium
3. Jul 14, 1930 1st Round, Group 3 Romania 3 - 1 Peru
4. Jul 14, 1930 1st Round, Group 2 Yugoslavia 2 - 1 Brazil
5. Jul 15, 1930 1st Round, Group 1 Argentina 1 - 0 France
6. Jul 16, 1930 1st Round, Group 1 Chile 3 - 0 Mexico
7. Jul 17, 1930 1st Round, Group 2 Yugoslavia 4 - 0 Bolivia
8. Jul 17, 1930 1st Round, Group 4 USA 3 - 0 Paraguay
9. Jul 18, 1930 1st Round, Group 3 Uruguay 1 - 0 Peru
10. Jul 19, 1930 1st Round, Group 1 Argentina 6 - 3 Mexico
11. Jul 19, 1930 1st Round, Group 1 Chile 1 - 0 France
12. Jul 20, 1930 1st Round, Group 2 Brazil 4 - 0 Bolivia
13. Jul 20, 1930 1st Round, Group 4 Paraguay 1 - 0 Belgium
14. Jul 21, 1930 1st Round, Group 3 Uruguay 4 - 0 Romania
15. Jul 22, 1930 1st Round, Group 1 Argentina 3 - 1 Chile
16. Jul 26, 1930 Semifinals Argentina 6 - 1 USA
17. Jul 27, 1930 Semifinals Uruguay 6 - 1 Yugoslavia
18. Jul 30, 1930 Final Game Argentina 2 - 4 Uruguay
